reference.title: Having pageflow alternatives based on installed blocks

section.p: To adapt a pageflow depending on the installed components, the Pageflow Designer allows for the design of alternative behaviours depending on whether dependent components are installed or not. To do this, a dedicated pageflow action is provided to answer the question "Is this component installed?". Considering the list of deployed components (e.g., WUI block IDs), the action com.odcgroup.wui.block.IsBlockWiredPageflowAction offers all of the functionality to define what tests must be performed and what should be returned as the action result. This result can then be used by a redirector to decide the alternative transition to follow.

Warning: This action only considers the list of deployed components and so will always provide the same answer, whoever the user is. Even if a particular user has no access to a component, it is still considered as deployed.
